[vc_row][vc_column]

Cap and Closure Mould

[vc_column_text]WASHUN is the professional closure moulds supplier, manufacturer, and maker. Our closure mould department offers the dedicated team for all kinds of closure designs and manufacturing different type of closure moulds, such as the moulds for bumper off closure, tamper evident closure, flip top closure, and multi-material closures

Currently, we provide the beverage closure moulds up to 64 cavity with balanced hot runner system. The optimized cooling system provides the better cooling effect during the injection process, it is the key for reduce the cycle time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

The Cap & Closure Mould Produced byWASHUN
